title: Video Game Symphony
description: Calling all mages and warriors: the chance to step into your favourite realm has arrived, with the Video Game Symphony! Adventure calls at 7:30 PM on March 21st 2020. Relive the thrill of some of the best video games with the conductor of the Montreal Video Game Orchestra and OPO favourite, Jonathan Dagenais! Experience the magnificence of a full LIVE orchestra accompanied by a cinematic video projection.
